com.riskgame.strategy

Class Aggressive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.strategy.Aggressive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerStrategy

    public class Aggressive
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerStrategy
    Aggressive player reinforces the strongest country, attacks until the army count of the attacking country is one, fortifies the strongest country.
    Author:
    Nikitha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Aggressive() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allOutAttack(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country attackerCountry, Country defenderCountry)
      All out attack mode where the attack happens with the maximum number of dice that the player gets based on the number of armies present in his attacking country
      void attackPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country attackerCountry, Country defenderCountry)
      This method calls the allOutAttack method of playerController class by passing the aggressive player's strongest country as the attacking country and the adjacent country of the strongest country which belongs to other player as the defender country
      void fortificationPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country fromCountry, Country toCountry, int armiesCount)
      This method is used for fortifying armies in the strongest armies
      Country getStrongestCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph, Player player)
      Method to get the strongest country from the Aggressive player's countries list
      Country getStrongestCountryWithAdjCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph, Player player)
      Method to get the strongest country
      Country getWeakestCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph, Player player)
      Method to get the weakest country from the Aggressive player's countries list
      void placeArmies(GameMapGraph mapGraph, Player player, Country country)
      This method places armies on the countries owned by Aggressive player
      void reinforcementPhase(Player player, GameMapGraph mapGraph, Country country, int reinforceArmyCount)
      This method reinforces armies to the strongest country of the Aggressive player
